headline: Stablecoins moved $35 trillion last year but only 1% of it was for 'real world' payments
summary: While stablecoins settled around $35 trillion last year, only around 1% of that represented genuine payments like remittances and payroll, a new report found.

raw.headline: Stablecoins moved $35 trillion last year but only 1% of it was for 'real world' payments

summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear in the week ahead, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.

headline: Dow Retreats on Financials Weakness. Nasdaq Rises 0.3%.
summary: A heavy slide in financial stocks pushed the Dow lower on Friday, cementing a second consecutive weekly decline for the blue-chip index.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 0.6%, or 274 points, on Friday.  The S&P 500 was flat while the Nasdaq Composite gained 0.3%.

headline: "I don't carry cash" : This Visa exec on why money is fading
summary: We are living in a content creator’s world. On this week's Financial Freestyle, host Ross Mac speaks with Johnathan Kolozsvary, Global Head of Small and Medium Business at Visa. Kolozsvary shares the results of Visa’s 2025 creator report and how Visa is stepping in to support content creators as they turn their passion into profit through entrepreneurship. To learn how you can profit from the creator economy, check out this episode of Financial Freestyle. Listen and subscribe to Financial Freestyle on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you find your favorite podcasts. ⁠https://finance.yahoo.com/videos/seri⁠⁠...⁠ Financial Freestyle with Ross Mac on Yahoo Finance is dedicated to promoting economic prosperity for all. Through expert insights, practical advice, and inspiring success stories, we empower you to build and grow wealth. Join us on this transformative journey toward financial freedom and inclusive economic growth.

summary: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE:NET) is one of the Best Quantum Computing Stocks to Buy for 2026. headline: Identity & Access Forum Announces 2026 Steering Committee
summary: Representatives from top technology organizations will lead Forum prioritiesREDWOOD CITY, Calif., Jan. 23, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Identity and Access Forum today announces its 2026 Steering Committees and officers, a cornerstone of the organization’s leadership. The Committee guides the Forum’s work, addressing cross-industry challenges and facilitating the adoption of trusted, interoperable solutions across several markets, including digital identity and access management, trust framework

headline: Crypto Firm Partners With Visa to Enable Near Real-Time Crypto-to-Fiat Off-Ramping
summary: Crypto payments firm Mercuryo has partnered with Visa to enable near real-time conversion of digital assets into fiat currency. Key Takeaways: Mercuryo’s partnership with Visa enables near real-time crypto-to-fiat off-ramps directly to Visa debit and credit cards. The integration cuts costs and settlement times, especially for cross-border payouts. Users can ...

headline: Assessing Visa (V) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Visa stock performance snapshot Visa (V) has been relatively flat over the past year, with a 0.1% total return. Recent performance shows a 7.6% decline over the past month and a 6.1% decline over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Visa. Visa’s recent 7.6% 30 day share price decline sits against a much stronger backdrop, with a 70.73% five year total shareholder return suggesting long term holders have seen a very different experience to recent sellers.
